channel.title: üè¢ Princeton University on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Princeton University on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Temporal Consistency for LLM Reasoning Process Error Identification
item.description: A new test-time method, Temporal Consistency, is introduced to improve LLM reasoning by leveraging iterative self-reflection.

item.title: ReasonFlux: Hierarchical LLM Reasoning via Scaling Thought Templates
item.description: ReasonFlux boosts LLM mathematical reasoning by using hierarchical thought templates, outperforming top LLMs like OpenAI’s 01-preview and DeepSeek V3.

item.title: RLHS: Mitigating Misalignment in RLHF with Hindsight Simulation
item.description: RLHS, a novel alignment algorithm, leverages simulated hindsight feedback to mitigate misalignment in RLHF, significantly improving AI’s alignment with human values and goals.

item.title: TidyBot++: An Open-Source Holonomic Mobile Manipulator for Robot Learning
item.description: TidyBot++: Low-cost, open-source holonomic mobile base makes robot learning easier.
